content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I see you might need help with HVAC services. May I please have your name to get started?
Hi, my name is Mary. I've been having some issues with my air conditioner.
Thanks, Mary! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your area?
Sure, I live at 123 Country Lane, Maplewood.
Thank you for the info. Let me check if 123 Country Lane, Maplewood is within our service area.
I'm sorry, Mary, but it looks like you're currently outside our service area. Unfortunately, we're unable to provide HVAC services at your location. Is there anything else I may help you with today?
